title: v.250 Hotfixes - May 3, 2024
content: Here you'll find a list of hotfixes that addresses a variety of bugs and issues reported within the v.250 Mayple Island update.

title: May 2024 Community Contests and Events
content: Take a look at the new and upcoming Community Contests below, and be prepared to test your imagination!

title: Hangout with Veeraah Livestream
content: Join Veeraah as he starts a new adventure in MapleStory!

title: Forest Child Lynn is Now Available!
content: Celebrate the release of new character Lynn with a new event!

title: Cash Shop Update for May 1
content: Gachapon Update, Anniversary Deals, Royal Styles, Maple Chic Packages, Choice Styles, and more!

title: [Updated 5/1] v.250 - Mayple Island Patch Notes
content: Happy 19th anniversary, MapleStory! Explore the numerous events, mini-games, and shops filled with one-of-a-kind goodies at Mayple Island.
